SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: a.line_id as lineId,a.line_direct as lineDirect,a.gps_content as content

SQLSCRIPT.FROMSQL: from t_sys_code a,t_sys_codeset b where a.CS_ID=b.ID and ${queryString}

from (select a.* from t_sys_resource_info a,t_sys_resource_role_r b where a.ID=b.RES_ID and b.ROLE_ID in (${roleIds}) and a.STATUS=1 union all select c.* from t_sys_resource_info c,t_sys_resource_user_r d where c.id=d.res_id and d.USER_ID=${userId} and c.STATUS=1)e order by res_code
SQLSCRIPT.FIELD: id,res_name as name,url,is_leaf as leafTag,res_code as code,pid,seq_no as seqNo
